message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $7,500.
Alice, thanks for the offer.  I'm interested, but I'm only able to go up to $7,000 right now.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $7,400.
